quote.issuer_name: China Titans Energy Technology Group Co., Ltd.
quote.nm: China Titans Energy Technology Group Co., Ltd.
quote.summary: China Titans Energy Technology Group Co Ltd is principally engaged in the supply of power electric products and equipment. The Company primarily operates its businesses through three segments. Direct Current (DC) Power System segment is mainly engaged in manufacturing and sales of direct current power system. Charging Equipment segment is mainly engaged in manufacturing and sales of charging equipment for electric vehicles. Charging Services segment is mainly engaged in the provision of charging services for electric vehicles. The Companyâ€™s products are mainly used in industries such as new energy electric vehicles and electricity. The Company is also engaged in the sales and leases of electric vehicles, as well as the provision of construction services of charging poles for electric vehicles. The Company distributes its products within the domestic market and to overseas markets.
